mapper.select:
insert into document(sid, sn, rsn, data, modified, poll_created, poll_modified) values
(#{it.sid}, #{it.sn}, #{it.rsn}, #{it.data,typeHandler=io.xxx.omni.omc.util.JsonbTypeHandler}, #{it.modified}, current_timestamp, current_timestamp)
on conflict (sid, sn) do update set data = excluded.data, modified = excluded.modified, poll_modified = current_timestamp where excluded.modified > document.modified returning *
